review_text: I love buying things I use constantly from Amazon instead of searching through stores looking for different items.  When you get a bit older and knees and arthritis bother you,  Amazon is heaven sent.  These bags work perfectly for my old Hoover vacuum.  Bought enough so I won't run out for quite some time.  Thanks Amazon.
product_name: Hoover 4010001A Type A Vacuum Bags, 3 Bags
